nodes.text: "Gi Shatta Gasha!" was a Huttese phrase of exultation and praise. In 32 BBY, a jubilant spectator shouted it out during the parade that was held in Theed by the Naboo and the Gungans after their homeworld was liberated from the Trade Federation. In 4 ABY, in response to the death of Emperor Palpatine at the Battle of Endor, several individuals were heard shouting that phrase during a riot on Coruscant.
